user_input: Modify the DHEM model. Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastrucutre level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Save file as Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the DHEM model specifications.

tasks.description: Open the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMIADVANCED infrastructure level, modify the file by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999, and save the modified file as 'Capacities_H2_FIDPCIPMIADVANCED_UNLIMITED'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the most appropriate data file for modification.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999
